overview: As T3Mediaâ€™s General Manager, Asia Pacific, Mica Imamura is responsible for managing overall company operations in the region, where he has resided for more than ten years. Mica was previously the CEO of AZTEQ Mobile Corporation, a venture-backed mobile software and services company. Before AZTEQ, Mica worked in the mobile telecom industry as a senior executive for Vodafone plc (AirTouch Communications), serving in a variety of general management roles across Japan. Prior to his business career, Mica served as an officer in the United States Army and flew as a reconnaissance pilot during Operation Desert Storm. Mica has a BS in Applied Science and Engineering from the United States Military Academy at West Point.
